imdb.plot outline: ULTRA SIMPLE GOLF, Created out of a love for golf and the deep insight gained on the PGA circuit, founders Muss Gammon and his son, Don, have developed these techniques to make it more enjoyable and fulfilling as a sport for everyone. Hosted by Don Gammon features local sporting icons and celebrities as well as International stars. The Show covers all aspects of golf and will guide you through all the common golfing problems, including driving, chipping and putting, giving you ULTRA SIMPLE techniques and drills that will improve your game. Filmed on location at the Oubaai Golf Estate.
